text: Giuseppe Insegno professionally known as Pino (born 1959) is an Italian actor and voice actor from Rome. Since 1986, Insegno has been a member of the comedy quartet Premiata Ditta. He voices multiple known characters in Italian such as Diego in the Ice Age franchising, Stan Smith in American Dad!, Chick Hicks in Cars. Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Rome Category:Italian voice actors
title: Pino Insegno
